entry.title: Follow-up regarding Motion to Activate BIP 3
entry.summary: The recent developments within the Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs) have led to significant changes in the process of future submissions. Following discussions and feedback from the community, it has been confirmed that BIP 3 has reached rough consensus and was subsequently deployed. This deployment marks a pivotal transition from BIP 2, indicating that all new proposals submitted to the BIPs repository will now be governed by the guidelines and frameworks established under BIP 3. The community's involvement and support played a crucial role in this advancement, demonstrating the collective effort in refining and enhancing Bitcoin's underlying mechanisms for improvement proposals.
